tools.name: CreateDocument
tools.description: Create a new Word document in OneDrive (4MB upload limit). Optionally include text content.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: File name without extension, or with .docx. The .docx extension is normalized.

parameters.name: text_content
parameters.description: Optional text content to include in the new document. If omitted, an empty document is created.

parameters.name: folder_id
parameters.description: Optional parent folder ID. If omitted, the document is created in the root.

parameters.name: conflict_behavior
parameters.description: Optional conflict behavior when a file with the same name exists. One of: fail, rename, replace.

tools.name: GetDocument
tools.description: Get a Word document's metadata and content (supports only `.docx`). Returns the document content as Markdown by default, or just metadata when metadata_only is True.

documentationChunks.content:
## Overview

Arcade.dev LLM toolkit for Microsoft Word enabling LLM-driven creation, retrieval, and modification of .docx files stored in OneDrive. It provides programmatic document creation, content retrieval (returns Markdown by default), appending text, and user/environment inspection; upload/append operations are limited to 4MB.

**Capabilities**

- Create .docx documents in OneDrive (MicrosoftWord.CreateDocument) with optional initial text; 4MB upload limit.
- Retrieve .docx metadata and content (MicrosoftWord.GetDocument); returns content as Markdown by default; supports metadata_only flag.
- Append text to the end of a .docx document (MicrosoftWord.InsertTextAtEnd); 4MB limit.
- Query the authenticated user and environment (MicrosoftWord.WhoAmI).

**OAuth**

Uses OAuth 2.0 via Microsoft (provider: microsoft). Required scopes: Files.Read, Files.ReadWrite, User.Read. API calls must present a valid access token with these scopes.
